title: can you get black alistar and human ryze from mystery gifts?
body: I want those 2 skins and was wondering if you could.

replies.body: Collector's Edition skins, like the ones you've mentioned, could only be achieved through digital or retail Collector's Edition packs. You cannot receive them via Mystery Gifts.
Does Urf Warick fall under that category? Different sources say different things. Thanks!

You cannot obtain him through Mystery Gifting. You can always feel free to check out [this reference](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ)! It gives a better idea of which skins you can and cannot get through Mystery Gifts. ^-^ 

If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out!

I have 2 questions about the mystery icons. 
When will it hit live, if it is hitting live, and will it be self and friend gifting or only available in gifting center?
Huh so my Corki and Kayle skins are still unobtainable? That's interesting. Kinda a pity since I don't use them and others can't haha
